src:
Kebakaran Kios di Rawamangun, Pemilik Kios Bensin Terluka
03 Nov 2019, 01:59 by Antara, Dwi Arjanto
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta -Seorang warga terluka dalam insiden kebakaran yang menghanguskan kios bensin eceran di Rawamangun, Pulo Gadung, Jakarta Timur, Sabtu malam, 2 November 2019.
"Korban atas nama Oman, 60 tahun pemilik kios. Luka bakar tangan kanan dari bahu sampai ujung tangan kanan," kata Kepala Seksi Pemadam Kebakaran Jakarta Timur Gatot Sulaeman saat dikonfirmasi di Jakarta, Ahad pagi, 3 November 2019.
Korban dilarikan menuju rumah sakit terdekat untuk menjalani perawatan.
Peristiwa kebakaran dilaporkan terjadi pukul 21.05 WIB, tepatnya di Jalan Wisma Jaya RT06/RW11 Kelurahan Rawamangun, Kecamatan Pulo Gadung.
Api diketahui berawal dari kios bensin eceran dan merambat ke sekitar saung TK lalu korban menghubungi damkar setempat.
Objek yang terbakar adalah kios bensin eceran dan saung sekolah Taman Kanak-kanak.
"Objek kios bensin eceran yang terbakar sekitar 12 meter persegi, sedangkan saung GK 25 meter persegi," katanya.
Pemadam Kebakaran Jakarta Timur mengerahkan 50 personel berikut sepuluh unit armada pompa pemadaman api. "Api padam pada pukul 21.32 WIB. Penyebabnya belum diketahui," kata Gatot.
Akibat kejadian kebakaran tersebut, kerugian diperkirakan berkisar Rp15 juta karena peralatan kios sebagian besar terbakar.
ANTARA
text:
Kiosk Fire in Rawamangun, Owner of Gasoline Kiosk Injured
03 Nov 2019, 01:59 by Antara, Dwi Arjanto
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - A resident was injured in a fire that burned down a retail petrol stall in Rawamangun, Pulo Gadung, East Jakarta, Saturday night, November 2, 2019.
"The victim is in the name of Oman, a 60-year-old kiosk owner. Burns right hand from shoulder to tip of right hand," said East Jakarta Fire Department Section Chief Gatot Sulaeman when confirmed in Jakarta on Sunday morning, November 3, 2019.
The victim was rushed to the nearest hospital for treatment.
The fire incident was reported to have occurred at 21.05 WIB, precisely at Jalan Wisma Jaya RT06 / RW11 Rawamangun Village, Pulo Gadung District.
The fire is known to have started from a retail petrol kiosk and spread to around the TK kindergarten and the victim contacted the local damkar.
The object that was burned was a retail petrol kiosk and a kindergarten school.
"The object of retail gasoline kiosks that burned was around 12 square meters, while the GK saung was 25 square meters," he said.
The East Jakarta Fire Department deployed 50 personnel and ten fire fighting pump units. "The fire was extinguished at 21.32 WIB. The cause is unknown," Gatot said.
As a result of the fire incident, losses were estimated at around Rp. 15 million because most of the kiosk equipment caught fire.
AMONG
